title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: MA22005/MA20002/MA20102Course ContentsMultivariate normal distribution -properties, estimation of parameters, Wishart and Hotelling s T2 distributions and their applications in testing of hypotheses problems. Classification of observations, Mahalanobis D2 and Fisher s discriminant function. Clustering. Principal component analysis. Canonical correlations and canonical variables. Factor analysis.
